# init(mapView:)

**Initializer**

Initializes the button with the map view that it should control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(mapView: MKMapView?)
```

## Parameters

- **mapView**: The mapView to associate with the button. Taps on the button change the appearance of this map view.

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKUserTrackingButton] object.
